00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Collections;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00034     public class FileList {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00038 
00039         // ============================================
00040         // PROTECTED Members
00041         // ============================================
00045         protected Hashtable data = null;
00046 
00047         // In This List i couldn't have two file with the same Disk Path
00048         // so i save it for a faster Search(diskPath)
00051         private Hashtable diskPaths = null;
00052 
00053         // ============================================
00054         // PRIVATE Members
00055         // ============================================
00056 
00057         // ============================================
00058         // PUBLIC Constructors
00059         // ============================================
00061         public FileList() {
00062             this.data = Hashtable.Synchronized(new Hashtable());
00063             this.diskPaths = Hashtable.Synchronized(new Hashtable());
00064         }
00065 
00066         // ============================================
00067         // PUBLIC Methods
00068         // ============================================
00070         public void Add (PeerSocket peer, FileInfo fileInfo) {
00071             // Add FileInfo into Peer's ArrayList
00072             ArrayList fileList = GetPeerFileList(peer);
00073             fileList.Add(fileInfo);
00074             UpdatePeerFileList(peer, fileList);
00075 
00076             // Add Disk Path
00077             this.diskPaths.Add(fileInfo.MyDiskName, fileInfo);
00078         }
00079 
00081         public void Remove (PeerSocket peer, FileInfo fileInfo) {
00082             // Remove Peer's FileInfo from ArrayList
00083             ArrayList fileList = (ArrayList) this.data[peer];
00084             if (fileList != null) fileList.Remove(fileInfo);
00085             UpdatePeerFileList(peer, fileList);
00086 
00087             // Remove Disk Path
00088             this.diskPaths.Remove(fileInfo.MyDiskName);
00089         }
00090 
00092         public void RemoveAll() {
00093             lock (this.data) {
00094                 foreach (ArrayList fileList in this.data.Values) {
00095                     fileList.Clear();
00096                 }
00097                 this.data.Clear();
00098                 this.diskPaths.Clear();
00099             }
00100         }
00101 
00103         public void RemoveAll (PeerSocket peer) {
00104             if (this.data.ContainsKey(peer) == true) {
00105                 ArrayList fileList = (ArrayList) this.data[peer];
00106 
00107                 foreach (FileInfo fileInfo in fileList)
00108                     this.diskPaths.Remove(fileInfo.MyDiskName);
00109 
00110                 fileList.Clear();
00111                 this.data.Remove(peer);
00112             }
00113         }
00114 
00116         public FileInfo Search (PeerSocket peer, FileInfo fileInfo) {
00117             lock (this.data) {
00118                 if (this.data.ContainsKey(peer) == true) {
00119                     ArrayList fileList = (ArrayList) this.data[peer];
00120                     int index = fileList.BinarySearch(fileInfo);
00121                     if (index >= 0) return((FileInfo) fileList[index]);
00122                 }
00123             }
00124             return(null);
00125         }
00126 
00128         public FileInfo Search (string diskName) {
00129             FileInfo fileInfo = this.diskPaths[diskName] as FileInfo;
00130             return(fileInfo);
00131         }
00132 
00134         public ArrayList GetFiles (PeerSocket peer) {
00135             return((ArrayList) this.data[peer]);
00136         }
00137 
00139         public bool HasFile (string filePath) {
00140             return(this.diskPaths.ContainsKey(filePath));
00141         }
00142 
00143 #if false
00144         // Return true if File Path is found in peer's list
00145         public bool HasFile (PeerSocket peer, string filePath) {
00146             ArrayList files = GetFiles(peer);
00147             foreach (FileInfo fileInfo in files) {
00148                 if (fileInfo.MyDiskName == filePath)
00149                     return(true);
00150             }
00151             return(false);
00152         }
00153 #endif
00154 
00155         // ============================================
00156         // PROTECTED (Methods) Event Handlers
00157         // ============================================
00159         protected ArrayList GetPeerFileList (PeerSocket peer) {
00160             ArrayList fileList = null;
00161             if (this.data.ContainsKey(peer) == false) {
00162                 fileList = ArrayList.Synchronized(new ArrayList());
00163             } else {
00164                 fileList = (ArrayList) this.data[peer];
00165             }
00166             return(fileList);           
00167         }
00168 
00170         protected void UpdatePeerFileList (PeerSocket peer, ArrayList list) {
00171             if (this.data.ContainsKey(peer) == false) {
00172                 this.data.Add(peer, list);
00173             } else {
00174                 this.data[peer] = list;
00175             }
00176         }
00177 
00178         // ============================================
00179         // PRIVATE Methods
00180         // ============================================
00181 
00182         // ============================================
00183         // PUBLIC Properties
00184         // ============================================
00185     }
00186 }
